meanings.definition: A city in California known for its salt flats.
meanings.sent1: I visited Salinas last summer to see the salt flats.
meanings.sent2: Many tourists enjoy exploring the salt flats in Salinas.
meanings.sent3: The residents of Salinas must love the salty air!
meanings.sent4: In Salinas, the salt flats stretch out like a vast white desert.
meanings.sent5: The sunsets in Salinas paint the salt flats in beautiful colors.

meanings.definition: A type of salt marsh or salt flat.
meanings.sent1: The wildlife in the Salinas provides a unique ecosystem.
meanings.sent2: The Salinas is a crucial habitat for various bird species.
meanings.sent3: I slipped and fell in the muddy Salinas while exploring.
meanings.sent4: The Salinas shimmered under the midday sun like a mirror.
meanings.sent5: The salty breeze from the Salinas carried the scent of the sea.

meanings.sent1: Mr. Salinas is a well-known artist in our community.
meanings.sent2: The Salinas family has a long history in this town.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if Salinas means 'salt' in Spanish.
meanings.sent4: The Salinas surname has a noble ring to it.
meanings.sent5: The Salinas clan gathers every year for a grand reunion.
